minelp.options.title: Mine Little Pony Settings
minelp.options.ponylevel.ponies.tooltip:
All players are ponies

Non-pony skins are replaced with a random background pony
minelp.options.ponylevel.humans.tooltip:
All players are humans

Pony skins are used but will be applied to the human model
minelp.options.ponylevel.both.tooltip: Players can be ponies or humans
minelp.options.skins.hdskins.disabled:
HD Skins is not installed

The HD Skins mod is required to upload skins from in-game and to use custom skin servers.

If you cannot use that you will have to go to www.minecraft.net to upload your skin there.
minelp.options.button.on:
Always Display

Both the pony button and HD Skins button are visible (if installed)
minelp.options.button.auto: Display only when HD Skins is not installed
minelp.options.button.off:
Never Display

You will only see the HD Skins button if installed.
minelp.options.option.disabled:
This option is locked in survival multiplayer.

Change game modes or leave and rejoin
the server to change this setting.
minelp.mobs.title: Mob Settings
